summary:
I am an online Content writer Journalist and Editor with strong ties to the online communities.
I am also:
- Experienced Editor In Chief with a demonstrated history of working in the publishing industry. 
- Strong media and communication professional skilled in Translation, Proofreading, Editing, and Blogging. 
- Native English proficiency with more than 3 years of English teaching experience.
- Experienced Writer with more than 15 years of online activity on various weblogs, websites, and online organizations with profound knowledge of both Farsi and English languages.
- Public Speaker and Community Organizer with more than 8 years of experience and substantial knowledge of Executive Management and Strategy Making.
- Content Strategy Expert with over 7 years of experience in content, social and digital marketing strategy management.

'description': '3feed online magazine is the leading magazine in "geek life style" and more. The magazine gives a different and fresh look into the everyday experiences of new and old media. Aside from its conventional content, 3feed focuses heavily upon providing its reader with unique vistas into any given subject. Be it a movie seen and written about a hundred times or a cultural and scientific subject, every 3feed writer always aims to amaze and entertain.

As the Editor-In-Chief I have:
- helped develop a unique tone for the magazine different from the everyday dull and monotonous  precedent of article writing in today's Farsi online content. A frisky, personal and joyful tone that is in harmony  with the new and modern "citizen of the world" experience.
- created brand new formats for online content.
- taught online content writing to potential 3feed writers. Providing them with vital experience and knowledge of creative writing, storytelling, and article writing.
- helped develop online content daily. writing at least 1000 words every day and editing almost every article now accessible on 3feed.
- led the magazine to be more visible and accessible to a broader range of audience. Making it a more welcoming environment for every opinion and worldview.', 'title': 'Co-Founder and Editor in Chief', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Peydayesh Publishings', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Tehran Province, Iran', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Peydayesh Publishings', 'description': "So far I have finished translating more than 50 books for Peydayesh. - recruited members to the academy including writers, translators, critiques, and possible investors.
